column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man was killed on the bridge bridge at Kampong Tov 7 Makara
column4: when a large truck overturned.------The incident took place at 11:45 pm on September 9
column7: Phnom Penh.------Authorities said that the overturned truck “Takeo 3A-2535”
column8: was being driven at high speed by a 26-year-old male from Takeo province. The man died instantly when the truck crushed him.------Nasty images from scene:------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/37455
